column2:
"It's been a while <%me>.
I apologize for causing you trouble last time."

"Thanks to you, I wasn't shocked when
I found a part of myself
that I didn't realize."

"I've finally got the courage to move forward,
even if everything still seems bizarre to me."

"I won't use my sister's name anymore.
This, is the end of Melrondia."

"From now on, I'm Melrondia.
I'm moving forward with my name."

"That Dark Falz- I mean,
Sir Gettemhart
said so."

"My powers are still lacking but,
if you need help, I please feel free
to call me anytime."
